metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13215 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Upstream kernel skcipher. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-64386293. References: Upstream kernel.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13215` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-7-generic - 4.4.0-7.22
linux-image-4.4.0-7-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-7.22
linux-image-4.4.0-7-lowlatency - 4.4.0-7.22
